articles.author: Niamh Kennedy, Lauren Kent, Vasco Cotovio, Catherine Nicholls
articles.title: Entire city evacuated after floods, 7 die in wildfires as extreme weather sweeps Europe - CNN
articles.description: Swaths of Europe have been battered by deadly extreme weather, as rivers threaten to burst their banks in central Europe following torrential rainfall, and wildfires tear through Portugal.
articles.content:
